alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 9:13AM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Louisiana... Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake Sabine River Near Deweyville Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier For the Sabine River...including Deweyville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Neches River...including Neches River Saltwater Barrier... Minor flooding is forecast. For the Pine Island Bayou...including Sour Lake...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 915 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier. * WHEN...From late Monday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Water is about two feet over portions of Four Oaks Ranch Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Sunday the stage was 2.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday morning and continue rising to a crest of 4.6 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Neches River Neches River Saltwater Barri 4.0 2.1 Sun 8 am CST 3.5 4.5 4.5 &&
